channel.title: BetterScapez!
channel.description:
[b]We need youre help![/b]
It is my first server ever!and i do mean first!i Created this from pimpscape in more than 30 minutes and as you see from my nickname im not very good at it you can connect and help me please. Here what ive currently done:
-Woodcutting -Bow fletching -mining -Cooking (with bugs so currently off) -Fixed ice barrage to normal size. -Smithing
Working on: -Special attack -gem crafting -leather,hides crafting -thieving -fishing -cool interfaces like in the shop pic. -Non attackable NPCs with magic! (see pic.)
Pictures: Woodcutting [img]http://img479.imageshack.us/img479/9596/woodcuttingbf6.png[/img]
[img]http://img53.imageshack.us/img53/8118/awesomedh0.png[/img]
[img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/3066/fletchingoz1.png[/img]
[img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/1627/mainshopdw6.png[/img]
more to come
Connect to us by HAMACHI Ham servername:betterscapez ham password:123
